if triggeredCellEventId() == cell_event2 then togglePauseGame(1); setPlayerAsWinner(0) setPlayerAsWinner(4) setPlayerAsWinner(5) endGame() unregisterCellTriggerEvent(cell_event2); end
scripts.unitCreatedOfType: if unitCountOfType(0, 'archmage')>=1 then archmage= lastCreatedUnit() end
